page.title: 05Playtime Activities
page.content: At 10:25am we have playtime.The boys sometimes play football with a tennis ball and sometimes we play bulldogs. Bulldogs is a game when some people stand in a marked semi-circle.When the boy chosen says a name,that boy runs to another semi-circle out in front. If he gets touched he is on it.When a boy says{bulldogs}everybody runs.This goes on until everybody is caught.We also play line-touch because we can use the lines over the playground.When it is summer we go on the grass and we have piggy-back fights and chariot races.The girls play skipping or do handstands or just sit on the grass. The most popular game at the moment is {skipping elastics.}When it is wet play -time we stay in the classroom and either draw or play quiet games.
